long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ¯ RSSFlow Reader - Your Intelligent RSS Reading Assistant
Providing RSS subscription, AI summaries, and multi-dimensional information flow features to transform your reading experience.

ğŸ’ª Core Features:

ğŸ‘‰ RSS Subscription
  âœ”ï¸ One-Click Subscribe: Automatically detect and subscribe to RSS feeds with a single click
  âœ”ï¸ Smart Updates: Background synchronization ensures timely content updates

ğŸ‘‰ AI Smart Summary
  âœ”ï¸ Multiple Models: Support for OpenAI format, Gemini, and other mainstream AI models
  âœ”ï¸ Intelligent Extraction: Automatically extract key information, viewpoints, and ratings
  âœ”ï¸ Custom Prompts: Customize prompts to create personalized summary styles
  âœ”ï¸ Offline Reading: Save AI summaries for anytime access

ğŸ‘‰ Multi-dimensional Reading Views
  âœ”ï¸ DayFlow: Date-organized information flow for easy daily content review
  âœ”ï¸ TagFlow: Topic-based aggregation using smart tags for in-depth exploration
  âœ”ï¸ Full-text Reading: Support for both original text and summary preview modes
  âœ”ï¸ Infinite Scroll: Smooth content loading for uninterrupted reading

ğŸ‘‰ Smart Toolbox
  âœ”ï¸ Full-text Search: Quickly locate historical articles and summaries
  âœ”ï¸ Similar Articles: Automatic detection of similar content to avoid duplicates
  âœ”ï¸ Keyword Extraction: Smart tagging system for automatic classification
  âœ”ï¸ Reading Statistics: Track reading habits and generate personalized reports

ğŸ‘‰ Personalization
  âœ”ï¸ Dark Mode: Switch between light and dark themes for eye protection
  âœ”ï¸ Shortcuts: Customizable keyboard shortcuts
  âœ”ï¸ Wooden Fish Mode: Sound effects when marking as read to enhance focus
  âœ”ï¸ Multi-language: Support for Chinese, English, and other interface languages

ğŸ’» How to Use:
ğŸ”¸ Click "Add to Chrome" and pin to toolbar
ğŸ”¸ Click the extension icon to open sidebar
ğŸ”¸ Add your favorite RSS feeds
ğŸ”¸ Complete the AI model configuration
ğŸ”¸ Start your smart reading journey!

ğŸ’¡ Use Cases
ğŸ”¸ Tech enthusiasts tracking industry trends
ğŸ”¸ Researchers following academic news
ğŸ”¸ Investors monitoring financial news
ğŸ”¸ Content creators gathering inspiration
ğŸ”¸ Journalists organizing information

â“ FAQ:

ğŸ“Œ Are all RSS feeds supported?
- Supports mainstream RSS/Atom formats, including RSS 2.0, RSS 1.0, Atom, etc.

ğŸ“Œ Does AI summary feature require additional payment?
- RSS reading and AI summary features are free to use. Podcast content generation requires activation code
- Users need to choose and configure their preferred AI models. Any costs associated with using AI models are independent of this extension

ğŸ“Œ Where is data stored?
- All data is stored locally without any cloud storage or synchronization, ensuring your reading privacy

ğŸŒŸ Special Notes:
- Completely local storage to protect your reading privacy
- Continuous updates and maintenance
- Professional technical support with quick response to user feedback
